Brawler.name: attract-brawlers
Brawler.addedArticle: Brawlers: "The other adventurers keep pointing at us and asking for more 'meat shields'. I don't know what they mean, but maybe if we get some more of us together, one of them will know!"
Brawler.completeArticle: "We never learned what the other adventurers meant, but at least they're happy now" one brawler said while being pushed in the general direction of several, oncoming, sharp objects.

Brawler.name: build-blacksmiths
Brawler.addedArticle: The brawlers are running on a worryingly low supply of dangerous implements, there just aren't enough blacksmiths to go around. Let's fix that.
Brawler.completeHeadline: Now THIS is a Lot of Pointy Things!
Brawler.completeArticle: The brawlers are now satisfied with the amount of deadly weapons in their possession. Could always use more, though.

Brawler.name: destroy-libraries
Brawler.addedArticle: The brawlers are fighting their greatest enemy, illiteracy, and need your help! "They say words can't die, but words ain't met me!" one brawler was heard chanting to no one in particular.
Brawler.completeArticle: Amongst the rubble of the destroyed libraries and lost literature, a brawler, having learned their lesson, lamented that there's no way they could somehow record their new knowledge for future use.

Brawler.name: lose-adventurers
Brawler.addedArticle: Brawlers want for more adventurers to die in combat. They say its so they can go to the afterlife of warriors, but we think they're just taking bets on who's the next to go.
Brawler.completeArticle: The brawlers are really happy about all this ruthless combat. Not the ones that died, of course, but they're not here to say otherwise.

Outrider.name: attract-outriders
Outrider.addedArticle: Outriders: "We're putting together a heist and need a crew. Tryouts are soon, and if you do us a favour and get us some candidates, it won't be you we heist!"
Outrider.completeArticle: The outriders sing triumphant that they formed a big enough crew for their heist. "You should have seen it, there were so many people, it was so overly complicated. One of us was dangling from the ceiling, another hid in a box, it was great."

Outrider.name: build-herbalists
Outrider.addedArticle: Outriders: "There's an awful scarcity of herbs available in our town, we're barely getting by. If you could build us a few more we would sure appreciate it."
Outrider.completeHeadline: Herb Prices Plummet in Market Crash
Outrider.completeArticle: Outrider's rejoice today, as their intentional flooding of the herb market has earned them a tidy profit on the fantasy stock market.

Outrider.name: preserve-forest
Outrider.addedArticle: The outriders are asking that you use the land you've got, and do some development projects in a row without any forestry. "We're practicing a month of loving our forests, and wandering in them, late at night..."
Outrider.completeArticle: Outriders: "Thanks for keeping all those trees around, easier to rob people in the forest. We can get back to guilt free destroying our environment now, thanks again."

Outrider.name: complete-quests
Outrider.addedArticle: The outriders are getting sick of being stuck indoors, and want to explore the world. Completing quests might let them stretch their legs.
Outrider.completeArticle: The outriders are equal parts content and exhausted from their questing. Wiping the sweat off their forehead, one responded "Phew! We uhhh, we really walked a lot... People don't really talk about how much walking is involved in being an adventurer, you usually skip over that part."

Performer.name: attract-performers
Performer.addedArticle: The performers want to put together a big show in your town, but need your help finding people first. "Yo bro if we get enough buzz going about this thing, your town could light up!"
Performer.completeArticle: The performers are happy with their music festival, one recalling "Yo bro that was sick! I only saw like 2 shows from the other side of town though, the crowds were pretty big..."

Performer.name: build-taverns
Performer.addedArticle: The performers guild have requested the construction of more taverns across town. "We want to put together a sick bar crawl, we just need a few more spots across the town to really make this night work..."
Performer.completeArticle: After another successful bar crawl hosted by the performers guild, their last stop was through a portal to another dimension. "I saw things, man... Like 'reconsider your place in the universe' stuff. Honestly, the drinks were just 'meh' though, so might not go back."

Performer.name: upset-arcanists
Performer.addedArticle: Performers have insisted we 'haze' the arcanists, by bullying them and taking away the things they like. "We just want them to loosen up a little, get away from those books and come party with us! And what's a little teasing gonna do, anyway..."
Performer.completeArticle: A group of performers have returned from their 'time out' to the realm of eternity. Arcanists were quoted saying "It's just a prank, you should really loosen up" in a mocking tone.

Performer.name: clear-terrain
Performer.addedArticle: The performers have grown a disdain for having to be around all the beautiful scenery. "We should be the prettiest thing here, get rid of it!"
Performer.completeArticle: Performers are happy now that all that horrible nature has been cleared out. "There, now everyone will have to pay to watch us instead."

Diviner.name: attract-diviners
Diviner.addedArticle: The diviners are interested in having more humble, pious, and peaceful folk in town, much like themselves.
Diviner.completeArticle: The diviners, while happy with the influx of their own kind are only now realising that the one thing they hate more than sinners is other diviners.

Diviner.name: build-shrines
Diviner.addedArticle: The diviners are requesting more shrines be constructed to save the soul of the town. "Nothing quite like an imposing, stone deity to inspire piety... and fear."
Diviner.completeArticle: The diviners seem to be quite impressed by the number of new shrines... but are now realising that they may have not all has the same idea on which gods they would be for...

Diviner.name: destroy-taverns
Diviner.addedArticle: The diviners are chomping at the bit to smite those sin-parlours of debauchery. They are requesting they be torn down at your earliest convenience.
Diviner.completeArticle: Diviners frolicked with merriment following the destruction of several, local taverns. They intend to capitalise on this turn of events by proposing "ample penance and self-flagellation" to the former patrons as a replacement for "drunken tomfoolery".

Diviner.name: clear-ruins
Diviner.addedArticle: The diviners are requesting that you... erase of some the ruins around the place, stating "the past describes a bunch of stuff we'd rather people forget, no point keeping them around, right?".
Diviner.completeArticle: The diviners are pleased by the removal of the ruins. "Glad we don't have to think about THOSE atrocities again!"

Arcanist.name: attract-arcanists
Arcanist.addedArticle: The arcanist are conducting a big, important, and very secret ritual. They are requesting need more mages for it to proceed. They won't tell us what it's for, I don't think we're invited.
Arcanist.completeArticle: All the arcanists gathered for their 'mysterious ritual', which our investigative journalist uncovered to be a board game night.

Arcanist.name: build-libraries
Arcanist.addedArticle: The arcanists want more books, what else is new? "We just love reading the things!"
Arcanist.completeHeadline: This is a Good Amount of Books
Arcanist.completeArticle: The arcanists are happy with all these new books because of course they are. "Liking books is one of our defining character tropes!"

Arcanist.name: upset-diviners
Arcanist.addedArticle: Arcanists are outraged at the diviners restrictions on their magical experiments. They are demanding we make them upset and drive them out of town. "So self righteous, all we did was summon a demon once or twice..."
Arcanist.completeArticle: "Yeah, thanks for making them upset, really taught them a lesson..." the arcanist reported, distracted by a giant locked cage behind him, something growling inside. "Buuut, we could actually use a diviner right now, we may have gone a little too far with the 'demon summoning' thing."

Arcanist.name: preserve-ruins
Arcanist.addedArticle: The arcanists guild have come with a new request, to preserve the ancient ruins surrounding our town for their research. "We're trying to get a research grant, and we just need to hold out and 'carefully study' them a little longer..."
Arcanist.completeArticle: Arcanists rejoice that their legitimate research proposal into the nearby ruins were successfully funded today. "Ok, we got the research money, you can burn them down whenever you want now."

Arcanist.name: fast-building
Arcanist.addedHeadline: TODO: Build X Buildings in a single turn
